verses.verse: Then Jonah <S%H3124><s%> prayed <S%H6419><s%> to Yahweh, <S%H3068><s%> his God, <S%H430><s%> out of the fish <S%H1710><s%>'s belly. <S%H4578><s%>

He said, <S%H559><s%> "I called <S%H7121><s%> because of my affliction <S%H6869><s%> to Yahweh. <S%H3068><s%> He answered <S%H6030><s%> me. <S%H990><s%> Out of the belly of Sheol <S%H7585><s%> I cried. <S%H7768><s%> You heard <S%H8085><s%> my voice. <S%H6963><s%>

For you threw <S%H7993><s%> me into the depths, <S%H4688><s%> in the heart <S%H3824><s%> of the seas. <S%H3220><s%> The flood <S%H5104><s%> was all around <S%H5437><s%> me. <S%H1530><s%> All your waves and your billows <S%H4867><s%> passed over me. <S%H5674><s%>
I said, <S%H559><s%> <S%H1644><s%> 'I have been banished from your sight; <S%H5869><s%> yet I will look <S%H5027><s%> again <S%H3254><s%> toward your holy <S%H6944><s%> temple. <S%H1964><s%>'

The waters <S%H4325><s%> surrounded <S%H661><s%> me, <S%H5315><s%> even to the soul. The deep <S%H8415><s%> was around <S%H5437><s%> me. <S%H5488><s%> The weeds were wrapped around <S%H2280><s%> my head. <S%H7218><s%>

I went down <S%H3381><s%> to the bottoms <S%H7095><s%> of the mountains. <S%H2022><s%> The earth <S%H776><s%> barred <S%H1280><s%> me in forever: <S%H5769><s%> yet have you brought up <S%H5927><s%> my life <S%H2416><s%> from the pit, <S%H7845><s%> Yahweh <S%H3068><s%> my God. <S%H430><s%>

"When my soul <S%H5315><s%> fainted <S%H5848><s%> within me, <S%H2142><s%> I remembered Yahweh. <S%H3068><s%> My prayer <S%H8605><s%> came in <S%H935><s%> to you, <S%H6944><s%> into your holy temple. <S%H1964><s%>
Those who regard <S%H8104><s%> lying <S%H7723><s%> vanities <S%H1892><s%> forsake <S%H5800><s%> their own mercy. <S%H2617><s%>

But I will sacrifice <S%H2076><s%> to you with the voice <S%H6963><s%> of thanksgiving. <S%H8426><s%> I will pay <S%H7999><s%> that which I have vowed. <S%H5087><s%> Salvation <S%H3444><s%> belongs to Yahweh. <S%H3068><s%>"
Yahweh <S%H3068><s%> spoke <S%H559><s%> to the fish, <S%H1709><s%> and it vomited out <S%H6958><s%> <S%H3124><s%> on the dry land. <S%H3004><s%>
